title: Scammed kinda need help riot
body:
Made a deal to swap mystery skins with a freind we swaped one each then he said one more so i sent one and he deleted me i have a screen shot of the last text and my gifting history which has all 3 skins except for the the last one that wasnt sent back cause he deleted me and did a runner

When we wure cahtting:    http://s1372.photobucket.com/user/jamiebra/media/asshole_zpsqbcccs75.png.html

Gifting history:   http://s1372.photobucket.com/user/jamiebra/media/asshole%202_zpsabnp3mik.png.html

It would be awsome if riot took the shaco skin of only a kitty and put it in my account that would make me happy cheers since he scamed me he doesnt deserve it and a ban.

replies.body:
Hey Jamiebra,

Using the gifting feature as a way to “trade” content between players is not the intended function of gifting. We can't control or verify the actions or intentions of players so we advise against using the gifting system for trading.

I'd advise against gift trading in future as we cannot reverse the transactions in situations like this.
Thier is evidence to and ignored yeah ok cheers & thank you for the help. letting a summoner get away with being a scumbag good one BYE!!!
i have screenshots of the whole convo if needed
